meanings.definition: To make a soft, low, breathy sound, as a horse does when it is excited or amused.
meanings.sent1: The horse was nickering happily in the field.
meanings.sent2: I heard the horse nickering as I approached the stable.
meanings.sent3: The nickering of the horse sounded like a secret whisper.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter filled the room, nickering like a playful foal.
meanings.sent5: The gentle nickering of the horse echoed through the barn.
